articles.content:
Greetings to PM of Antigua and Barbuda
    Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, premier of the cabinet of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a message of greetings to Lester Bryant Bird, Prime Minister of Antigua and Barzudur, Loveroment and people of Untigua and Barbuda on the occasion and wished him success in his work for the prosperity of the country.
